title: Robinhood Reports 43% Revenue Decline
sub_head: The brokerage has been adding a range of new products to build up its user base
body:
Robinhood Markets Inc.’s revenue fell to $299 million in the first quarter, a decline of 43% from the same period last year and the company’s fifth consecutive quarterly drop.
The company narrowed its loss to $392 million from a $1.4 billion loss in the same period last year. Its stock fell 10% in aftermarket trading Thursday.
